Detailed Description

template<class V>
class Bound< V >

The Bound class extends the Node class to be able to have a BoundingVolume.

It contains functions to set and update the BoundingVolume for each Node.

Bound Nodes are ordered such that leaf children are on the left on non-leaf children. This makes collision detection between Nodes easier.

The BoundingVolume held by this Bound wraps around all child Nodes.

Bound Nodes can be used in 2D or 3D scenegraphs. This is controlled by the template parameter, which should eihter be a Vec2 or a Vec3.

See also:
Node
BoundingVolume
Author:
Ben Constable, original Java code by Oli Winks
Version:
1.0
